materials.raw_text:
- Germanium (Ge): 30 g  
 - Lanthanum (La): 120 g  
 - Magnesium (Mg): 15 g  
 - Silicon (Si): 90 g  
 - Yttrium (Y): 30 g

sourcing.instructions:
- Germanium can be sourced from semiconductor suppliers or specialized chemical suppliers. 
 - Lanthanum and Yttrium can be obtained from rare earth metal suppliers. 
 - Magnesium is available at metal suppliers or online. 
 - Silicon can be sourced from electronics suppliers or chemical suppliers.
